name: Centaur in Wonderland
description:
While viewing this living painting, you'll be able to interact with several different elements, but it's intentionally unclear what things do at first. Just try clicking and dragging anything that seems interactable. Exploring is part of the experience! 

Some elements will interact with each other, so if anything unexpected happens, you probably triggered a special event. Sometimes, these events change things permanently. If you're curious, restart to experiment and find out how stuff works!

There's no ending or goal, so just fuck around until you feel complete :)

The controls are simple:

left clickclick and drag scroll wheelzoom cursormove around when you're zoomed in Ztoggle zoom lock Xtoggle position lock Ctoggle credits screen Rrestart the game
